name: Burger Restaurant - Be the Chef and Boss
name_original: Burger Restaurant - Be the Chef and Boss
description: Develop expert culinary skills in Burger Chef, a gripping Time Management game with cooking different foods! Take command of the kitchen and demonstrate the skills of a master chef. Start with hamburgers and hot dogs and work your way to becoming the best known restaurant in the country! Decorate your restaurant, buy new furniture, find awesome accessories, and upgrade your kitchen to become a Star Chef!
